bakeoff_entry_time.label: Bakeoff Entry Time (Seconds)
bakeoff_entry_time.tooltip: The amount of time during which users can enter a bakeoff

bakeoff_cook_time.label: Bakeoff Time (Seconds)
bakeoff_cook_time.tooltip: The amount of time that users can use to bake.

bakeoff_cooldown_time.label: Bakeoff Cooldown Time (Seconds)
bakeoff_cooldown_time.tooltip: The amount of time between the last bakeoff and the next bakeoff

bakeoff_steal_amount.label: Steal Amount (Donuts)
bakeoff_steal_amount.tooltip: The amount of donuts that will be stolen from a user

bakeoff_steal_chance.label: Steal Chance (%)
bakeoff_steal_chance.tooltip: The chance that a user successfully steals donuts from another participating user

bakeoff_sabotage_amount.label: Sabotage Amount (Donuts)
bakeoff_sabotage_amount.tooltip: The amount of donuts that the user will lose if the sabotage is successful

bakeoff_sabotage_chance.label: Sabotage Chance (%)
bakeoff_sabotage_chance.tooltip: The chance for a user to successfully sabotages another user

bakeoff_anomoly_chance.label: Anomoly Chance (%)
bakeoff_anomoly_chance.tooltip: The chance for an anomoly to occure every tick.

bakeoff_anomoly_chance_breakdown.label: Breakdown Chance (%)
bakeoff_anomoly_chance_breakdown.tooltip: The chance for an anomoly to be of type 'Breakdown'

bakeoff_anomoly_chance_flop.label: Flop Chance (%)
bakeoff_anomoly_chance_flop.tooltip: The chance for an anomoly to be of type 'Flop'

bakeoff_anomoly_chance_flop_lower_bound.label: Flop - Lower Bound (%)
bakeoff_anomoly_chance_flop_lower_bound.tooltip: The smallest amount of donuts, in percentages, that the user could lose due to a flop

bakeoff_anomoly_chance_flop_upper_bound.label: Flop - Upper Bound (%)
bakeoff_anomoly_chance_flop_upper_bound.tooltip: The largest amount of donuts, in percentages, that the user could lose due to a flop

bakeoff_anomoly_chance_oven_fail.label: Oven Fail Chance (%)
bakeoff_anomoly_chance_oven_fail.tooltip: The chance for an anomoly to be of type 'Oven Fail'

bakeoff_anomoly_chance_oven_fail_lower_b.label: Oven Fail - Lower Bound (%)
bakeoff_anomoly_chance_oven_fail_lower_b.tooltip: The smallest amount of donuts, in percentages, that the user could lose due to a oven fail

bakeoff_anomoly_chance_oven_fail_upper_b.label: Oven Fail - Upper Bound (%)
bakeoff_anomoly_chance_oven_fail_upper_b.tooltip: The largest amount of donuts, in percentages, that the user could lose due to a oven fail

tick_refresh_rate.label: Tick function refresh rate (seconds)
tick_refresh_rate.tooltip: Set this higher to ease burden of heist on CPU, lower increases CPU burden but faster response time.
